name: Glacier Bay Dual-Flush Elongated Toilet in White - WaterSense Certified
description: The Glacier Bay 2-piece Elongated Toilet in White delivers a powerful flushing performance and features a WaterSense certified design to help conserve water. The toilet's vitreous china construction offers resistance to acid, abrasion and staining. The all-in-one product contains the toilet bowl, tank and seat along with a wax ring and floor bolts with caps. Limited Lifetime Warranty.New 2-piece design is sleek and elegant17 in. chair height elongated bowl meets ADA standardsWaterSense certified product meets high-efficiency toilet (HET) standardsVitreous china resists stains, acid and abrasionDual-flush design provides superior flushing performance of solids and liquids to help prevent clogsWhite toilet with a chrome-plated, top-mounted flush button complements many bathroom decors
